text: What a frightful event! he wrote. 'I tremble! What infatuation! Personally I am. indifferent, but I really tremble for my country! I may be mistaken, 1tho' I cannot but fear that the exasperation of the People will be so great at the return of Ultratoryism that the Commons House upon a dissolution, which must be had, will be a mass of Radicalism, & then God knows what may happen.. thation! Porsonally I am indiffewent, but I really tremble. For my lountry!I may he mistaktn, stho'I cannot but.
handwritten_text: For my lountry!I may he mistaktn, stho'I cannot but.
name: Tizigna Botrugno
